question: Would you say I am fat? Ideal weight?
question_content: So I'm an 20 years old and 5'2 I have always been pretty active but I weigh 125. I wear a 5/7 jean. I work out 2-3 days a week and I have noticed a little toning of my mid section but my butt and thighs won't go away! Would you say I am over weight and fat? If you have an Instagram you can check out my pictures @samanthakeighly

answers.answer_content: You definitely don't sound overweight and fat. That sounds perfectly normal. Typical weigh range for a 5ft2 woman is 105-135lb. Hope this helps.

you seem skinny and i cheked ur BMI(bodymassindex) is 22.9 which is a perfect score so ur not fat and bum and thys is something all women naturally have but if you have a problem with it try more bum and thigh excersises at the gym
Id say perfect and guys like big butts
Google body mass index or (bmi) that'll tell ya, and sweety people's opinions dont matter! Be happy who u are! :)
